src:
Le robó la billetera a su propia cuñada

06 Nov 2019, 00:47

Un sujeto fue detenido ayer tras sustraerle la billetera a una joven que se identificó como su cuñada.Fuentes policiales informaron que las 4.30 de la mañana, por requerimiento del Comando Radioeléctrico, efectivos de la comisaría Sexta se constituyeron en el barrio Antinaco, donde aprehendieron a un joven de apellido Cárdenes (20), quien habría sido sindicado por su cuñada, una joven mujer de 19 años, como el presunto autor de haberle sustraído una billetera con dinero en efectivo, en virtud de lo cual quedó alojado en la dependencia policial a disposición de la Fiscalía  de Instrucción en turno. Se invitó a la damnificada a radicar la denuncia penal correspondiente en la Unidad Judicial N° 6.
text:
He stole his own sister-in-law's wallet

06 Nov 2019, 00:47

A man was arrested yesterday after removing the wallet from a young woman who identified himself as his sister-in-law. Police sources reported that at 4.30 in the morning, at the request of the Radioelectric Command, troops from the Sixth police station were constituted in the Antinaco neighborhood, where they apprehended a young man named Cárdenes (20), who would have been syndicated by his sister-in-law, a young 19-year-old woman, as the alleged perpetrator of having stolen a wallet with cash, under which he was housed in the police department to provision of the Prosecutor's Office of Instruction on duty. The victim was invited to file the corresponding criminal complaint in Judicial Unit No. 6.
